causes: Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA), 42 U.S.C. §§ 12111 et seq.

case_data.name: EEOC v. GAIL DARLING TEMPORARIES
case_data.plaintiff_description: Equal Employment Opportunity Commission, on behalf of one or more workers.
case_data.summary: The EEOC San Antonio office filed this suit on April 24, 1997 in the U.S. District Court for the Western District of Texas, El Paso Division. On December 16, 1997 the parties entered a joint motion to dismiss and a notice of filing settlement agreement. Neither the complaint nor the consent decree is currently available.
